trait.name: Adhesive (Object Form Only)
entries: The mimic adheres to anything that touches it. A Huge or smaller creature adhered to the mimic has the {@condition Grappled|XPHB} condition (escape {@dc 13}). Ability checks made to escape this grapple have {@variantrule Disadvantage|XPHB}.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 5} (with {@variantrule Advantage|XPHB} if the target is {@condition Grappled|XPHB} by the mimic), reach 5 ft. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) Piercing damage—or 12 ({@damage 2d8 + 3}) Piercing damage if the target is {@condition Grappled|XPHB} by the mimic—plus 4 ({@damage 1d8}) Acid damage.

action.name: Pseudopod
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 5}, reach 5 ft. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) Bludgeoning damage plus 4 ({@damage 1d8}) Acid damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it has the {@condition Grappled|XPHB} condition (escape {@dc 13}). Ability checks made to escape this grapple have {@variantrule Disadvantage|XPHB}.
